name: Unchained
title: Chris Dixon on the Worst Tech Policy Heâ€™s Seen: Unchained w/ Chris Dixon
text:
Synopsis
The Biden Administration's tech policy has been critically viewed as detrimental to the crypto and AI sectors, with a perceived failure to effectively address fraud and protect consumers while damaging the industry's reputation.

Key Insights
- Chris Dixon criticizes the Biden Administration's tech policy as the "worst" he has seen in his lifetime
- The administration is accused of spending four years "attacking good actors"
- Despite targeting actors in the tech space, fraud and bad actors remain high or have potentially increased
- The policy is viewed as harmful to both consumers and the overall reputation of the tech/crypto ecosystem
